name: Deluxe Rubber Duck (Senior Dev Edition)
description: Solves bugs you didn't know you had. Comes with tiny glasses and a judgmental stare. Never argues in code reviews.

name: Emergency Coffee IV Drip Kit
description: For when drinking coffee isn't fast enough. Medically questionable, legally ambiguous. Pairs well with production deploys on Friday.

name: Stack Overflow Premium Pass
description: Skip the passive-aggressive comments! Get answers without being told your question is a duplicate from 2009.

name: Mechanical Keyboard That's TOO Loud
description: Make sure EVERYONE knows you're coding. Cherry MX Earthquake switches. Neighbors will complain. Worth it.
